TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDocumentType extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

summary.span: 代表 XML 文件類型定義 (DTD)。

span.span: Represents an XML Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料類型定義 (DTD) 中 XML 可將執行下列作業：Data Type Definitions (DTD) in XML are a way to do the following: - 驗證 XML 樹狀結構，可在有限程度。Validate XML trees to a limited extent. - 展開的實體，這是一種文字取代。Expand entities, which is a form of text replacement. - 提供預設的屬性。Supply default attributes. 此類別代表 XML 概念的 DTD。This class represents the XML concept of a DTD. DTD 支援[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]限制。DTD support in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] is limited. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 會展開內部實體，根據預設，但它將不會解析外部實體參考，除非相關之用來載入 XML 樹狀結構。 will expand internal entities by default, but it will not resolve external entity references unless an with an associated is used to load the XML tree. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 將不會驗證 dtd，文件，但是您可以使用驗證執行 DTD 驗證，如有必要。 will not validate a document against a DTD, but you can use a validating to perform DTD validation if necessary. 若要驗證[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]樹狀目錄中的針對 XML 結構描述，使用方法。To validate an [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] tree against an XML schema, use the method. 當文件包含 DTD 中所定義的實體參考時，參考會展開在建立 XML 樹狀結構時。When a document contains entity references that are defined in a DTD, the references are expanded upon creation of the XML tree. 不過，當序列化或儲存的 XML 樹狀結構時，會保留展開實體的內容。不是實體參考。However, when you serialize or save the XML tree, the content of the expanded entities is preserved; the entity references are not. DTD 中的預設屬性會具體化為 XML 樹狀結構中的一般屬性。Default attributes from the DTD will be materialized as regular attributes in the XML tree. DTD 中的預設屬性會具體化之後，沒有任何方式可判斷屬性 DTD 中的預設屬性。After a default attribute from the DTD is materialized, there is no way to determine that the attribute was a default attribute from the DTD. 您可以填入 XML 樹狀結構與 XML 文件，其中包含使用內部 DTD。You can populate an XML tree with an XML document that contains an internal DTD. XML 樹狀結構就會包含節點。The XML tree will then contain a node. 當序列化或儲存樹狀目錄時，內部 DTD 也會儲存文件的一部分。When you serialize or save the tree, the internal DTD will also be saved as part of the document.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 從其他 物件初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 XML 樹狀結構的深層複本時，主要是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is primarily used internally when making a deep copy of an XML tree.

MemberSignature.Value: public XDocumentType (string name, string publicId, string systemId, string internalSubset);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string publicId, string systemId, string internalSubset) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, publicId As String, systemId As String, internalSubset As String)
public: XDocumentType(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ publicId, System::String ^ systemId, System::String ^ internalSubset);

param.name: name
param.span: ，其中包含 DTD 的限定名稱 (Qualified Name)，此名稱與 XML 文件之根項目的限定名稱相同。

span.span: A that contains the qualified name of the DTD, which is the same as the qualified name of the root element of the XML document.

param.name: publicId
param.span: ，包含外部公用 DTD 的公用識別項。

span.span: A that contains the public identifier of an external public DTD.

param.name: systemId
param.span: ，包含外部私用 DTD 的系統識別項 (System Identifier)。

span.span: A that contains the system identifier of an external private DTD.

param.name: internalSubset
param.span: ，包含內部 DTD 的內部子集。

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for an internal DTD.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有內部 DTD 的文件。The following example creates a document with an internal DTD. 當建立物件，它會指定字串，包含內部子集 DTD (Pubs)，以及的限定的名稱。When it creates the object, it specifies the qualified name of the DTD (Pubs), and a string that contains the internal subset. 因為文件不會使用公用或私用的外部 DTD、`publicId`和`systemId`設為`null`。Because the document does not use a public or private external DTD, the `publicId` and `systemId` are set to `null`. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.NextNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ]> Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InternalSubset { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的內部子集。

span.span: Gets or sets the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: ，包含這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的內部子集。

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有包含內部子集 DTD 的文件。The following example creates a document with a DTD that contains an internal subset. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: ，包含這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的名稱。

span.span: A that contains the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含 DTD 的 XML 文件。The following example creates an XML document that contains a DTD. 建立文件之後，它會擷取 DTD 使用這個屬性的限定的名稱。After creating the document, it retrieves the qualified name of the DTD using this property. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Pubs ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 取得此節點的節點類型。

span.span: Gets the node type for this node.
The node type.
For objects, this value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為所有的類別，衍生自包含屬性，您可以撰寫程式碼的運作方式的具體子類別的集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 然後在集合中每個節點的節點型別可以測試您的程式碼。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來擷取的節點型別物件。The following example shows the use of this property to retrieve the node type for an object. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` DocumentType ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PublicId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的公用識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: ，包含這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的公用識別項。

span.span: A that contains the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 文件使用公用外部 DTD，這個屬性會包含外部 DTD 的公用識別項。If an XML document uses an external public DTD, this property will contain the public identifier of the external DTD.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SystemId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的系統識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: ，包含這個文件類型定義 (DTD) 的系統識別項。

span.span: A that contains the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 文件使用外部的私用 DTD，這個屬性會包含外部 DTD 的私人識別碼。If an XML document uses an external private DTD, this property will contain the private identifier of the external DTD. ## Examples 下列範例會建立私用外部 DTD 參考的 XML 文件。The following example creates an XML document that refers to an external private DTD. DTD 不需要內部子集。The DTD does not have an internal subset. 若要呼叫建構函式會反映使用外部的私用 DTD。The call to the constructor reflects the use of the external private DTD. 它會傳遞`null`內部子集。It passes `null` for the internal subset. ```csharp string pubsDtd = @" "; File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd); string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, "Pubs.dtd", null), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); doc.Save("Pubs.xml"); // Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. XmlReaderSettings xrs = new XmlReaderSettings(); xrs.ProhibitDtd = false; xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD; xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto; XmlReader xr = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Load(xr); XDocumentType dt = doc2.Document.DocumentType; Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId); ``` ```vb Dim pubsDtd As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd) Dim target As String = "xml-stylesheet" Dim data As String = "href='mystyle.css' title='Compact' type='text/css'" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc _ .FirstNode _ .AddBeforeSelf(New XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, "Pubs.dtd", Nothing)) doc.Declaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true") doc.Save("Pubs.xml") ' Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. Dim xrs As XmlReaderSettings = New XmlReaderSettings() xrs.ProhibitDtd = False xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto Dim xr As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(xr) Dim dt As XDocumentType = doc2.Document.DocumentType Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` SystemId:Pubs.dtd ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteTo(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteTo (writer As XmlWriter)

span.span: An into which this method will write.
Write this to an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供內部寫入至 XML 樹狀結構的方法。This method is primarily used internally by the methods that write an XML tree to an .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteToAsync (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteToAsync(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ WriteToAsync(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
